text: Antonis Vardis (; 7 August 1948 â€“ 2 September 2014) was a Greek composer and singer. Vardis was born in the Moschato suburb of Athens. Vardis met some legendary Greek musicians when he was six years old, including Vassilis Tsitsanis. Vardis would go on to work with George Dalaras, Yiannis Parios, Vasilis Papakonstantinou, and Haris Alexiou. In 2013 Vardis was diagnosed with cancer and was transferred to Hanover, Germany, to undergo surgery described as successful. However, he died on 2 September 2014 at Hygeia Hospital in Athens. He was 66. He was survived by his wife and their two children. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Greek composers Category:Singers from Athens
